question:
You rrecently went a concert and thought one of the singers was very good. You want to tell him how you feel.
Write a letter to the singer. In your letter
Say how you feel about his performance.
Give details of your musical activities.
Explain how you would like him to help you with your musical activities.
Write at least 150 words.
text: My name is David Stark and recently, I  attended a concert called "Musical Night". I am writing this letter to express my deepest feelings about your performance.

Firstly, I am so amazed to attend the program where I mostly enjoyed your singing talents. Furthermore, when I was listening to your traditional songs, I felt extreme peace even after having a huge crowd at the function. In addition, I imagined myself on the stage because you are my only role model. To explain this, I would like to inform you that I am also learning traditional music. Basically, I am a trainee singer and enhancing my musical skills by attending class at a very popular academy of the legend A.R.Raheman.
It would be my honour if you can provide me with an opportunity to take part in your rehearsal activities.
I hope you will consider my request to work with your team which can benefit  my future career.
